      • build

        Creates the AopsTheater
        Returns:
        the Theater object itself or null if the initial Stage failed

      • update

        public java.lang.String update(java.lang.String json)
        Simulates one 'update' of the entire theater.
        Parameters:
        json - A json including: numFrames and a list of all player's events
        Returns:
        a json file representing the state of the theater or null if the update failed

      • step

        public java.lang.String step()
        Simulates a single step with no exterior events (mouse/keyboard).
        Returns:
        a json file representing the state of the theater or null if the step failed

      • getState

        public java.lang.String getState()
        Gets the state of the theater with no updates.
        Returns:
        a json file representing the state of the theater or null if a failure occurred

      • getMethodsJSON

        public java.lang.String getMethodsJSON(java.lang.String uuid)
        Generates a JSON containing the method headers of a given UUID
        Parameters:
        uuid - An actor's UUID or null for the Stage's methods
        Returns:
        a json file containing the method headers

      • invokeMethod

        public java.lang.String invokeMethod(java.lang.String json)
        Asks a single theater piece to perform a specific method as defined in the json.
        Parameters:
        json - Contains the actor UUID or null for stage UUID, the method name, and the parameters.
        Returns:
        a json file representing the state of the theater or null if a failure occurred

      • reset

        public java.lang.String reset()
        Resets the Theater to its original state.
        Returns:
        a json file representing the state of the theater or null if a failure occurred
